definition[0]: to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work
example[0]: Further information can be obtained from head office.
example[1]: You will need to obtain permission from the principal.
example[2]: the results obtained through these surveys
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people say that they get a result, a ticket, some information etc rather than obtain it:
example[3]: You have to get permission from your parents.
definition[1]: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
